page.title: 04Our Church and its Services
page.content: The rules of our church all came from Jesus.You always have the choice of whether you want to believe in Jesus or not.In our church there are only two basic rules one is to love your neighbour the other is to love God.There is a saying if you don't obey rules you are like the man who built his house on the sand, if you do you are like the man who built his house on the rock.Jesus still calls people to follow him to this very day. We still have the choice to follow him.In our church in olden days, adults were baptized but now it is mostly children and babies. {Church Services:A Wedding} I have been a bridesmaid four times. The best thing I like about it is wearing those long dresses.I dont like going up the aisle because I go all red in the face.
